metadata.min_stack_comments: Breaking change at 8.14.0 for the Windows Integration.

author: Elastic
rule.description:
Identifies a suspicious managed code hosting process which could indicate code injection or other form of suspicious
code execution.
rule.name: Suspicious Managed Code Hosting Process
tags: Data Source: Microsoft Defender for Endpoint
rule.query:
file where host.os.type == "windows" and event.type != "deletion" and
  file.name : ("wscript.exe.log",
               "cscript.exe.log",
               "mshta.exe.log",
               "wmic.exe.log",
               "svchost.exe.log",
               "dllhost.exe.log",
               "cmstp.exe.log",
               "regsvr32.exe.log")
